$eref.description: Represents a single version of a cookbook.

___attributes.description: Files in the cookbook under the attributes/ subdirectory.

___libraries.description: Files in the cookbook under the libraries/ subdirectory.

___providers.description: Files in the cookbook under the providers/ subdirectory.

___frozen?.description: Whether or not this cookbook is frozen.

___templates.description: Files in the cookbook under the templates/ subdirectory.

___name.description: The fully-qualified name+version of the cookbook.

___files.description: Files in the cookbook under the files/ subdirectory.

___root_files.description: Files under the root directory of the cookbook.

___definitions.description: Files in the cookbook under the definitions/ subdirectory.

___recipes.description: Files in the cookbook under the recipes/ subdirectory.

___resources.description: Files in the cookbook under the resources/ subdirectory.
